entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to 12 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or a few thunderstorms changing to periods of rain this evening and ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this evening then light overnight. Temperature rising to 12 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Overcast. Temperature steady near plus 1.
